scripts.build:panel: rm -rf html/dist/panel && yarn parcel build --no-source-maps --no-cache --public-url ./ --dist-dir html/dist/panel panel/panel.html
scripts.watch:panel: rm -rf html/dist/panel && yarn parcel watch --no-source-maps --no-cache --public-url ./ --dist-dir html/dist/panel panel/panel.html
